Она протиснет своё податливое тело в самые узкие щели и вычистит все нечистоты и грязь, продолжая работу, которую когда-то выполняла и в королевском дворце.<tab>Я — искатель грязи и преследователь чистоты. — Статная метла<tab>Время Чистки<tab>Даёт группе иммунитет ко всем атакам от <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>марионеток<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your sewer skink minion. When it comes to keeping aqueducts free of creepy-crawlies, this lightning-tongued lizard is the hero of the day.<tab>Found dwelling deep in the Sil'dihn waterways, these skinks keep the stones clear of both mold and vilekin alike with quick lashes of their long, blue tongues─a service considered more valuable than that provided by any Sil'dihn royal guard's patrol.<tab>Why, I'd rather hire a sewer rat to mind my larder! - Milala<tab>Flickering Lick<tab>Накладывает слабость к <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животным<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> на всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your wind-up philos minion. By the by...you see it too, yes?<tab>There once was a man who shouldered a heavy responsibility in the capital of the star. In spite of this, he bore a name that made light of himself, and delighted in the simple things with his cherished friends. This mammet was made in his honor.<tab>Believe, and walk in faith. Let the light of your soul shine for all to see. - Loyal Friend<tab>Devotion<tab>Даёт 10 очков действия всем союзникам в радиусе действия, у которых нет аналогичных действий.

Summon your wind-up Erichthonios minion. He'll get them all out. He must.<tab>This mammet depicting Erichthonios, a warder of Pandæmonium, was crafted in secret by a colleague impressed by his unyielding sense of duty. When one's workplace is overrun by the most violent manifestations of creation magicks, clutching tight to such a doll must keep the spark of hope alive.<tab>I-I'll save them! I...must... - Erichthonios<tab>Point Out<tab>Снимает все полезные эффекты со всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your corgi minion. Fluffy, full of beans, and fit for a queen.<tab>A type of herding dog known for its short legs, the corgi is the result of breeding squat specimens that could avoid the hooves of livestock. In the old tongue of the northern seas, the name means “dwarf dog,” which, aside from the literal meaning, is a reference to a folktale that claims the creatures were once ridden by Lalafells.<tab>As if I would trail along behind you...like some sniveling lapdog... - Nero tol Scaeva<tab>Sit!<tab>Снижает защиту всех противников в радиусе действия на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. Born in the Cieldalaes. Summon your sky blue back minion.<tab>Hatched on an isle of the Cieldalaes, this young blue back was originally intended to be kept as livestock, but an excess of chicks led to it being rehomed. On account of belonging to a flightless species, it has a penchant for going on adventures off the island.<tab>Stickin' yer beak into me business again? - Blanstyr<tab>Surprise<tab>Снижает скорость передвижения всех противников в радиусе действия на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Summon your suzusaurus minion. Might be able to tow a rowboat to safety if not a galleon.<tab>Believed to be related to the legendary elasmosaurus, this young sea dragon had become separated from its herd when it encountered a submersible, which it decided to follow. Inquisitive by nature, it cranes its long neck to scout out its surroundings, and will not stray from whomever it considers its parent.<tab>I have a feeling everything is going to go swimmingly! - T'laqa Tia<tab>Waterspout<tab>Увеличивает атаку всех союзников в радиусе действия на 25. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Призовите вашего миньона — маму-автоматон. Мама всё знает лучше. Слушайте маму.<tab>Говорят, что эта миниатюрная модель автоматона долгое время принадлежала странствующему менестрелю. Также говорят, что её внешний вид был основан на облике таинственного существа, сопровождавшего маленькую девочку в её бесчисленных приключениях... А может это было всего лишь её сном?<tab>Ты в порядке? Уверен, что не перегибаешь палку? — Мама<tab>Помощь Мамы<tab>Сокращает время повторного призыва миньонов на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your wind-up Cagnazzo minion. The puddles and ponds are his to command.<tab>In his single-minded pursuit of mighty foes, Cagnazzo tasked one of his minions with creating a being in his likeness. The result was this automaton, which, needless to say, disappointed the archfiend of water. Its maker was never seen again.<tab>You'd best not disappoint! - Cagnazzo<tab>Death Spin<tab>Делает всех союзников в радиусе действия неуязвимыми к атакам <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>марионеток<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Призовите вашего миньона — Искашку. Он может найти дорогу самостоятельно и без вас, но предпочитает идти рядом.<tab>Даже среди своих собратьев этот Лопоррит был самым маленьким и последним, кто пробудился от своего многовекового сна. Хотя его миссия заключалась в исследовании земли, его главной страстью стало совершение новых открытий, и он делится рассказами о своих путешествиях со всеми на Луне.<tab>Там целый мир, который можно исследовать! — Шэглс<tab>Открытие<tab>Мгновенно восстанавливает повреждённый союзный Щит.

Summon your private pachypodium minion. Its detonating days are thankfully over.<tab>Underling to Gancanagh, this pachypodium mine had hidden itself for an ambush, but it burrowed too deep into the ground and missed its chance to detonate. Subsequently released from military service, it appears to be enjoying its newfound freedom.<tab>Take care you are not caught in blassst. - Eshana<tab>◆◎◎※☆!<tab>Снижает ОЗ Глаза-Искателя противника на 90%. Не действует, если Глаз-Искатель уже неработоспособен.

Summon your wind-up Halone minion. For those who like it icy cold.<tab>While traveling through the snow in search of awe-inspiring beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if the cold had addled his mind, he later crafted this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her imposing grace.<tab>You must do better than that against me! - Halone<tab>The Fury's Aegis<tab>Изменяет тип автоатаки группы с прямой на атаку по области. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12 с.

Summon your bantam train minion. It choo-choo-chooses to haunt you.<tab>This model train was assembled from mysterious parts salvaged from the bottom of the sea. Who it was meant to carry is unknown, but it is somehow tinged with a phantasmal air. Curiously, despite having no mechanism for self-propulsion, it tirelessly chugs along after you.<tab>Allow me to perform a locomotive experiment with this body shape. - Envious Ea<tab>Runaway Train<tab>Наносит урон с силой 30 и отбрасывает назад всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your wind-up Godbert minion. No less gentlemanly for its compact size, this mammet stands ever ready to do what only a Manderville can.<tab>Godbert Manderville, the realm's greatest goldsmith and distinguished proprietor of the Gold Saucer, created this automaton in his own likeness to serve as a prize for the Make It Rain event. It is guaranteed to enhance the gentlemanliness of anyone it accompanies.<tab>Splendidly suplexed, Lord Godbert! - Nashu Mhakaracca<tab>Manderville Drive<tab>Снижает ОЗ Щита противника на 70%. Не действует, если Щит уже неработоспособен.

Summon your wind-up Aidoneus minion. If sighs could kill, you'd be dead a thousand times over.<tab>There once was a man whose ability to see and channel aether was unrivaled. With his singular talent, he kept watch over the Underworld, the place whereto all departed souls return, and solemnly served the star. This mammet was made in his honor.<tab>My ideals are inviolate. Invincible. - Unwavering Ancient<tab>Sigh<tab>Накладывает слабость к <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>марионеткам<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> на всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your puffin minion. Wants to work smarter, not harder.<tab>Native to the northern seas, this seabird is distinguishable by its orange bill and feet. It swims effectively using its short wings in lieu of fins, and can catch several fish in a single dive. Having witnessed you vanquish fiends with ease, however, this creature decided to follow you in hopes of leading a comfortable life.<tab>Adventurers, you see, are as migratory birds in need of a place to rest their weary wings. - Antoinaut<tab>Wing Flap<tab>Даёт группе способность наносить дополнительный урон Камням Арканы. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your mossasaurus minion. It's adorable now, but wait till it grows up.<tab>Encountered in distant seas, this dinosaur young belongs to a species named for its unhurried disposition. Though the creature may look adorable, it will one day grow to be a monstrous predator. Even now it is on the lookout for potential prey, which thankfully does not include you. Yet.<tab>Your eyes are starting to have the sharpness of a predator about them. - Hamon<tab>Hunt<tab>Увеличивает атаку на 10 и защиту на 5 за каждые 5% потерянных ОЗ. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your okuri chochin minion. For those who like a little fright with their light.<tab>This small lantern ghost found in Mount Rokkon was born when a child's well-loved paper lantern came to harbor a spirit. Possessed of a friendly nature, it happily follows its master everywhere rather than misleading hapless souls in the dark as its kind are wont to do.<tab>You are the light that guidesss us, comrade. As such, I would have you prepare the lampsss we use for night patrol. - Eshana<tab>Terrifying Tongue<tab>Наносит урон с силой 120 всем противникам в радиусе действия и увеличивает атаку группы на 20. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your posher otter minion. Part futuristic, part antiquated, all class.<tab>Believed to hail from the Far East, this otter was fishing out in the open sea when its boat capsized. Though it managed to find its way to a desert island, it was used as a test subject by automata and made to wear steam-powered wings and dapper attire.<tab>Speaking of steam, I think I feel some coming out my ears. - Regitt<tab>Steam Jump<tab>Наносит пятикратный урон всем противникам в радиусе действия.

Summon your Rubellite Weapon minion. Scaled down or no, it can scratch you up good.<tab>Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for aerodynamics testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.<tab>Feast your eyes on the likeness of the Crimson Conqueror, the Vermilion Villain, the Scarlet...Scoundrel, the one and only Ruby Weapon! - Warmachina Fanatic<tab>Rubellite Dynamics<tab>Увеличивает атаку группы на 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

This adorable critter will make you love every ape that you see, from chimpan-a to chimpan-z. Summon your chimpanzee minion.<tab>A highly intelligent species of ape, the chimpanzee can be trained to use tools as well as simple language. Some naturalists believe them to be close relatives to mankind, but none have been able to determine an evolutionary process.<tab>May the fortune of the monkey attend you! - Saru Bugyo<tab>Munch<tab>Запускает ловушку противника, как если бы она была ваша. Если она наносит урон, то её сила увеличивается на 150%.

Summon your exciting dynamite minion. For those who love the threat of death or serious injury to follow their every step.<tab>While this dynamite young is determined to do what it was born to do─detonate spectacularly and engulf all in a fiery conflagration─it is thankfully some ways away from accomplishing the deed. According to Thrillingway, there is no thrill quite like using it in place of a pillow when sleeping.<tab>Take care you are not caught in blassst. I would be upssset to lose a helpful adventurer sssuch as you. - Eshana<tab>Play Detonate<tab>Обезвреживает установленные ловушки противника.

Summon your mikra Lyssa minion. Definitely meant to be a wolf─the ancients said so.<tab>Made in the likeness of the bipedal wolf Lyssa, this automaton was apparently used to test the creation's viability at smaller proportions. While it is skilled at various striking and grappling techniques, the effect is commensurate with its diminutive size.<tab>Give us a hand and we'll get out of your hair. Wolf's honor. - The Wolf Burglar<tab>Rolling Sobat<tab>Снижает ОЗ ближайших Врат противника на 90%. Не действует, если Врата уже неработоспособны.

Summon your Shiromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a <var 1A 02 /var>ninja<var 1A 01 /var> dog.<tab>This white ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. Driven by a keen sense of duty, he decided to follow you in gratitude for laying his mistress's soul to rest. Written upon the scroll he carries is an ancient ninjutsu technique for parting people from their treats.<tab>Shinobi are trained to put duty ahead of all else. - Oboro<tab>Dogged Duty<tab>Увеличивает защиту всех союзников в радиусе действия на 10 (30 если союзник — <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животное<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>). <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your wind-up Athena minion. To follow you everywhere─<var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is her wish.<tab>Boasting the likeness of Athena, the first chief keyward of Pandæmonium, this automaton was created in secret by a colleague who greatly admired her. That colleague later vanished without a trace, some days after which a peculiar dog with a man's face is said to have appeared in the facility.<tab>Athena must be the sole focus of your attention. - Lahabrea<tab>Lure<tab>Устанавливает ловушку, которая при срабатывании снижает скорость передвижения всех противников в радиусе действия на 70%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Задержка активации:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your wind-up Barbariccia minion. Will blow you away─figuratively.<tab>Assuming the likeness of Barbariccia, one of Golbez's four archfiends, this automaton was made according to a blueprint devised by a goldsmith who chanced to witness her. Wishing to share the voidsent queen's unique beauty with others, the artisan focused on capturing her flowing hair and savage grace.<tab>B-Barbariccia... She is come! - Ciriatto<tab>Hair Raid<tab>Снимает все эффекты со всех противников и союзников в радиусе действия.

Summon your goggle-eyed dogu minion. Guaranteed to win any staring contest.<tab>Retrieved from the bottom of the sea, this mysterious clay figurine is entirely hollow and moves by means of magic. While scholars believe that it was used in some manner of ritual during the Second Astral Era, others such as Delion of <var 1A 02 /var>The Thavnairian Truth<var 1A 01 /var> fame are convinced it was made in the image of an alien.<tab>Who would have thought that the answer to our prayers would be found in ancient pottery of all places? - Zlatan<tab>Dogu Power<tab>Делает союзные Врата, Щит и Глаз-Искатель неуязвимыми для урона. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с.

Summon your Kuromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a <var 1A 02 /var>ninja<var 1A 01 /var> dog.<tab>This black ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. As compassionate as he is loyal, he refused to forsake his mistress even after she had turned into an abomination, and chooses to travel with you as part of a pilgrimage dedicated to her soul.<tab>Nothing short of death will cause a shinobi to forsake his mission. - Oboro<tab>Dogged Devotion<tab>Наносит урон с силой 60 всем противникам в радиусе действия и снижет скорость передвижения на 70%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your uolosapa minion. To fly after you and perch prettily on your head is its divine calling.<tab>One cannot talk about the creatures of the south sea isles without mentioning this pink-beaked sparrow. Since ancient times, its kind have been revered as sacred, and legend speaks of an especially intelligent and friendly specimen that considered itself a servant of the Speaker.<tab>I seem to have made a feathered friend. - Fufucha<tab>Southern Wind<tab>Снимает все эффекты со всех противников и союзников в радиусе действия.

Summon your Tourmaline Weapon minion. Stands ready to lend you a helping hand or six.<tab>Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for heat resistance testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.<tab>Emeralds will do quite nicely. - Crystal Merchant<tab>Tourmaline Beam<tab>Снимает все полезные эффекты со всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your wind-up Oschon minion. Guaranteed not to wander off on you.<tab>Upon seeing the manmade wind-up Halone, Nald'thal was taken by a bout of mischievousness and decided to create an automaton of his own using a jewel buried in the earth. While the resultant product assumes the likeness of Oschon, unlike the deity upon whom it is based, it follows its master faithfully rather than wandering freely.<tab>He's fond of wandering wheresoever his whims take him... - Krile<tab>Wanderlust<tab>Увеличивает атаку группы на 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your Kydonia Strolls minion. For when you need a stony face to stare at you unflinchingly.<tab>This hovering sculpture was made in the likeness of Kydonia Knolls, a peculiar rock formation on the moon's surface resembling a face. Seeking to promote it as a sightseeing destination, a Loporrit asked Khloe Aliapoh to distribute the objects, which occasionally glow with the moonlight that they supposedly harbor.<tab>The kindness in your heart shines like moonlight on oiled skin. - Company Muscle<tab>Moony Smile<tab>Наносит урон с силой 80 всем противникам в радиусе действия и снижает защиту на 13%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your vicarious vacationer minion. A lean, mean, holidaying machine.<tab>This Sharlayan-made automaton was provided to aid in your work on your island sanctuary. An industrious new model, it has been programmed to enjoy its vacation as efficiently and effectively as possible to maximize average rest and relaxation amongst your island workforce.<tab>Next you'll be telling me you're one of the Warriors of Light, back from a half-decade long holiday! - Mother Miounne<tab>Holiday Spirit<tab>Устанавливает ловушку, которая при срабатывании наносит урон с силой 260 всем противникам в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Задержка активации:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your wind-up Golbez minion. Too small to conceive of and carry out a mass invasion of the Source...or is he?<tab>This automaton modeled after Golbez was discovered in his domain in the depths of the Thirteenth's moon. Perhaps created by one of the black-clad knight's loyal minions, it boasts peerless attention to detail, and exudes an unshakable resolve─albeit on a diminutive scale.<tab>Golbez? Of course I know of him. Only a fool without ears wouldn't. - Fearful Voidsent<tab>Flames of Eventide<tab>Наносит урон с силой 90 всем противникам в радиусе действия.

Summon your Torgal pup minion. Go on, you know you want to pet the adorable fellow. What could possibly go wrong...?<tab>According to the wandering minstrel, the beast who appeared to aid the stranded Clive was a guiding spirit born of its master's memory. So impressed was the ever-insightful musician by the creature, he decided to recreate a young version of it, which, despite its diminutive size, already possesses the indomitable spirit of the fine hound it will one day become.<tab>What an adorable little puppy you have! - Hildibrand<tab>Mighty Yip<tab>Накладывает слабость к <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животным<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> на всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your pink Bean minion. Three, two, one...GO!<tab>Little is known about these mysterious life-forms that suddenly appeared in the Gold Saucer apart from the fact that they love to race, and this specimen has apparently decided that it wants to race you without end. Rumor has it that underneath its rotund exterior is a skeleton that looks like a nightmarish amalgam of man and bird, but there is no ready way to determine the truth.<tab>Let me guess. You've lost...no, broken...no, <var 1A 02 /var>traded for magical beans<var 1A 01 /var> the parts we need. - Jessie<tab>Eliminate<tab>Отбрасывает назад всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your Pegwin minion. You chased after it; now it chases after you.<tab>Suddenly appearing in the Gold Saucer alongside the Beans, these winsome little automata love nothing more than being in the thick of a race and chased around like a prize. Rumor has it they were created by a friend of the Beans, who was inspired by a penguin they had witnessed somewhere out there.<tab>My, what charming little toys. - Kan-E-Senna<tab>Scurry<tab>Обезвреживает установленные ловушки противника.

Summon your Hydaelyn idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Hydaelyn, but she says you already have Hydaelyn at home.<tab>This automaton was inspired by Hydaelyn as She was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the will of the star and the embodiment of Light, She guided many a mortal soul in Her age-old conflict with Her bitter rival Zodiark, whom She divided into fourteen parts with─if the artist is to be believed─a mighty kick.<tab>Please, Mother Hydaelyn! Hearken to our plea! Lend us Your divine Light! - Minfilia<tab>Blessing of Light<tab>Увеличивает атаку всех союзников в радиусе действия на 25. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your Zodiark idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Zodiark, but she says you already have Zodiark at home.<tab>This automaton was inspired by Zodiark as He was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the embodiment of Darkness, He is worshipped by the Ascians, who seek to rejoin the sundered world. Even twelve millennia after His defeat at the hands (or feet) of His bitter rival Hydaelyn, His grudge towards Her burns strong.<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark. - Igeyorhm<tab>Blessing of Darkness<tab>Связывает всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Summon your wind-up Fourchenault minion. Don't even think about dragging it into conflict, or it shall give you a look of sternest disapproval.<tab>A veritable congress of these automata was produced as part of a public relations drive for the Forum. However, a complaint from their unwitting model led to the units being consigned to the storehouse, and it was only later at the scholarch's orders that they now see the light of day as promotional items for an academic publication.<tab>Gods know Fourchenault's a cranky old goat, so I'm sure you butt heads often enough. - Theopauldin<tab>Sensible Leadership<tab>Делает всех союзников в радиусе действия неуязвимыми к атакам <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животных<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Призовите вашего миньона — заводного Зидана. Несмотря на свою внешность, он не из тех, кто любит шутить.<tab>Давным-давно жил-был весёлый юноша, принадлежавший к банде воров, маскировавшихся под театральную труппу. Легенда гласит, что он и его товарищи намеревались похитить принцессу королевской крови — поступок, который втянул его в грандиозное приключение... только потому, что она его об этом попросила!<tab>Тебе не нужна причина, чтобы помогать людям. — Зидан<tab>Что это!?<tab>Изменяет тип автоатаки группы с прямой на атаку по области. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12 с.

Summon your repulu minion. Comes complete with a fetching bow tie to prevent misplacement.<tab>Its name meaning “honored lizard,” this reptile native to Aloalo Island is believed by the locals to be a fountain spirit that brings good fortune to those who accord it due reverence. Whatever the truth of their nature, this particular critter was so impressed with your prowess in battle, it chose to follow you wherever you should go.<tab>Most colorful, would you not agree? - Hinageshi<tab>Swift Tongue<tab>Снижает атаку всех противников в радиусе действия на 40%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Призовите вашего миньона — новенькую Крайл. Как много можно изменить, всего лишь обновив гардероб!<tab>В честь годовщины возрождения Эорзии, Гильдия искателей приключений заказала новую куклу, вдохновленную героической Крайл. В новом облачении пиктоманта, с опущенным капюшоном и миленькой серёжкой, она излучает дух приключений и новых открытий.<tab>Наконец-то я испытаю мою пиктомантию. — Крайл<tab>Причудливый Жест<tab>Уменьшает очки действия всех противников в радиусе действия на 50% от максимального значения.

Призовите вашего миньона — Великого Белого Цутиноко. Удивительно мягкий и милый талисман удачи с Дальнего Востока.<tab>Изначально приняв его за статуэтку, хэби бугё была удивлена не меньше вас, когда это маленькое, похожее на змею существо вдруг зашевелилось. Почитаемый на Дальнем Востоке, этот чешуйчатый предвестник удачи скорее всего оказался в Лимсе Ломинсе тайно пробравшись на борт корабля восточной делегации.<tab>Моти-и-и! — Великий Белый Цутиноко<tab>Глиняная Благодать<tab>Даёт 10 очков действия всем союзникам в радиусе действия, у которых нет аналогичных действий.

Призовите вашего миньона — альпаку криа, чья слюна пока ещё не имеет неприятного запаха.<tab>Родившаяся на ранчо в Вачунпело эта молодая альпака обладает мягким темпераментом и дружелюбным нравом. В силу юного возраста её слюна еще не успела стать вонючей, так что если вы хотите побаловать себя её неотразимой пушистостью, то сейчас самое время.<tab>Мелкий монстр плюнул в меня! — Вук Ламат<tab>Вдохновляющий Плевок<tab>Увеличивает атаку и защиту всех союзников в радиусе действия на 40. Группа миньонов, применившая это действие, покидает игровое поле после окончания действия эффекта. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с.

Summon your air-wheeler M9 minion. Will whoosh, vroom, and zoom its way into your inner's child heart.<tab>This toy model of the air-wheeler A9 electrope-powered vehicle is tremendously popular amongst the children of Solution Nine. It is said that, in the past, a fleet of these were fitted with lights and flown in formation as part of magnificent fireworks displays.<tab>The wheels turn into wings and it goes flying off into the sky! It's amazing! - Wayward Child<tab>Hyper Speed<tab>Увеличивает скорость передвижения всех союзников в радиусе действия на 35%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your Squeak the Coyote minion. Quiet as a cloud and swift as a lightning bolt when on the prowl.<tab>Being on the small side for a coyote, this creature might be mistaken for a fox save for its distinct greyish brown coat. It was roaming the land in search of purpose when it stowed away on a merchantman to arrive at the Wolves' Den, but not before being named “Squeak” by the sailor who discovered it in the ship's hold.<tab>Spend too long peering at the ground, and a coyote is sure to come and bite you on the arse. - Thaffe<tab>Howl of Glory<tab>Снимает все ослабляющие эффекты со всех союзников в радиусе действия.

Summon your Cornservant minion. Will never let you go hungry.<tab>At the conclusion of your travels with the Cornservant, the corn-shaped spirit that provides sustenance to the hungry, the being quietly left one of its kernels in your bag. That kernel quickly grew into another Cornservant, which ever regards you anxiously, worried that you might require a feed.<tab>Where there are those in need of sustenance, I will be there. - The Cornservant<tab>Well Fed<tab>Восстанавливает 100 ОЗ всем союзникам в радиусе действия (150, если союзник — <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животное<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>).

Summon your bluecoat cat minion. Surprisingly sweet-tempered despite its regal bearing.<tab>A handsome breed of cat prized for its beautiful, bluish grey coat. Though some believe that it hails from northern Aldenard, its origin is still the subject of dispute. In recent years, a breeding program at the Studium has led to the bluecoat being seen in those lands with ties to Sharlayan.<tab>Why is your laboratory overrun with felines? Did the stress finally break you? - Margrat<tab>Noble Gaze<tab>Наносит урон с силой 90 всем противникам в радиусе действия.

Summon your mischief maker minion. Should only make mischief and not do you one, if the name is to be believed...<tab>This souvenir clown doll was found at the Strayborough Deadwalk. A demonstration of electrope's capabilities, it moves as if it were a living thing, but it is merely an object and therefore can neither harbor malicious intent nor act upon them...knock on wood.<tab>I did not realize there was another clown in town! - Papa Gruff<tab>False Smile<tab>Устанавливает ловушку, которая при срабатывании наносит урон с силой 260 всем противникам в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Задержка активации:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your tin sentry T1 minion. It's your own fault if you get hit.<tab>This toy soldier was popular centuries ago in the Alexandria of old. Legend has it the living Sphene was gifted one by a child she met when she had snuck into town, and it became the basis for the design of the mechanical soldiers that were developed shortly thereafter.<tab>It's time we gave that new toy of yours a proper field test. - Cid<tab>Kingdom Defense<tab>Наносит урон с силой 230 всем противникам в радиусе действия.

Summon your wind-up Zero minion. And thus she is returned.<tab>A mammet inspired by a hero of the Thirteenth, who wandered alone for millennia after her world was consumed by Darkness. Sharing her taste in cuisine, the Hannish artisan responsible poured their heart into its creation and ensured accuracy in every detail, such as the scythe she wields from her days as an avatar.<tab>I will let it burn, this fire in my breast. - Zero<tab>Dark Scythe<tab>Ежесекундно наносит по 10 очков урона всем противникам в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с.

Summon your Lawnblazer minion. Railroad not required.<tab>Created by Xak Tural Railing as part of a publicity campaign, this toy locomotive marries a simple and warm design with spirited movement. So well received was the product by staff members, the company is entertaining the possibility of venturing into toy manufacturing in earnest.<tab>Behold, the pinnacle of locomotive engineering! - Shenza<tab>Express Train<tab>Удваивает количество восстанавливаемых ОЗ у союзников, находящихся у Врат. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с.

Summon your not-so-bighorn minion. The bigger the horns, the brighter the future.<tab>The horns of this Turali sheep can weigh as much as thirty-three ponzes, and the sound of their clashing in territorial battles is said to echo for malms around. Juvenile specimens that develop prominent horns are a rarity, held to be an elite among its kind.<tab>They call me “the Ram that batters,” not the “battered sheep”! - Isaudorel<tab>Meadow Eyes<tab>Накладывает слабость к <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животным<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> на всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your wind-up Mamool Ja minion. Innocence never looked so adorable.<tab>Appearing to be a piece of local handicraft, this mammet designed in the likeness of a Mamool Ja child was picked up by your retainer during a venture. From the traditional garments to the supple scales, so true to life are the details, one can only assume it was made by a most exacting artisan.<tab>Traditional Mamool Ja bathing dance will be shunned no more! - Bugaal Ja<tab>Mamool Jam<tab>Делает всех союзников в радиусе действия неуязвимыми к атакам <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>животных<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Призовите вашего миньона — заводную Гарнет. Теперь она чувствует себя не такой одинокой... следуя за вами.<tab>Давным-давно жила принцесса, происходившая из древнего рода призывателей. Легенда гласит, что её похитила банда воров, после чего она отправилась в путешествие под чужим именем. Обладая ангельским голосом, она часто напевала прекрасные песни, которые трогали сердце любого и позволяли чувствовать себя менее одинокой и более позитивной.<tab>Однажды я стану королевой, но я всегда буду собой. — Гарнет<tab>Приказ Королевы<tab>Связывает всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Summon your petit punutiy minion. Leading scientists agree: gazing upon a punutiy daily enhances one's sense of well-being.<tab>Native to the waters of Ihuykatumu, this punutiy young was separated from its parents during a tempest. In the course of wandering alone, it chanced to witness you hunting on the river, and decided to adopt you as its new herd. As it grows, the thin patch of moss upon its back will thicken into a luxurious carpet.<tab>First alpacas, now punutiys. We're relying a lot on animals for this journey. - Alisaie<tab>Counter Current<tab>Наносит урон с силой 90 и отбрасывает назад всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your Ilyikty'i minion. A little cub that has aspirations to be a great hunter.<tab>A close cousin to the coeurl, this feline native to Yak T'el has long been revered by the Xbr'aal, who are known to take in lost cubs to raise as capable hunting beasts. This particular creature has taken to you, and seems intent on honing its skills at your side.<tab>Well, well, look what the coeurl drug in! - Baderon<tab>Hunter's Roar<tab>Снижает атаку всех противников в радиусе действия на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your speaking stone minion. Don't even think about getting it started.<tab>This relic of the Yok Huy found in the Skydeep Cenote appears to be little more than a loud-mouthed mammet, but it is in fact the core of a stone golem. Having been divested of its shell, it now stalks you with a view to merge with the body of its destroyer.<tab>Might be as ol' Bremondt's a chatterbox, but he sure as hells ain't no busybody. - Bremondt<tab>Chatterbox<tab>Ежесекундно наносит по 10 очков урона всем противникам в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20 с.

Summon your Black Kitten minion. Can you hold your own against her feline ferocity!?<tab>An electrope doll designed in the likeness of Black Cat, the rising star of the Arcadion's light-heavyweight division. Harnessing the soul of the fearsome Cath Palug, she possesses razor-sharp claws and looks the part of a feline out to toy with her foe. All spectators can enter the draw for a chance to win one of their very own!<tab>I hope you're ready to be ripped to shreds! - Black Cat<tab>Copy Kitten<tab>Снижает защиту всех противников в радиусе действия на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.

Summon your quetzal minion. Do not be fooled by its winsome appearance─you are in the presence of <var 1A 02 /var>divinity<var 1A 01 /var>.<tab>Making its home in the forests of Tural, this beautifully hued bird is deified as the herald of good fortune and abundant harvests. While ordinarily difficult to domesticate, this adventurous specimen was so taken by your retainer's tales, it decided to embark upon a journey with you.<tab>I daresay I'm <var 1A 02 /var>green<var 1A 01 /var> with envy. - Shallow Moor<tab>Verdant Blessing<tab>Увеличивает защиту всех союзников в радиусе действия на 20. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your Rororrlo Teh minion. Caution: staring directly at its head may result in temporary blindness.<tab>In the Yok Huy tongue, the name of this being means “a tiny little snow spirit that shines as if smiling in the moonlight.” They are born in the mountains of Urqopacha when the moon illuminates the snow, and when approximately four of them combine, they are said to become the larger Rorrloh Teh.<tab>Now give me a Coerthan winter! Enough ice and snow to bury a behemoth! - Pipin<tab>Powder Snow<tab>Связывает всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Summon your tankardtender minion. Rather more manageable than a barrel.<tab>Once this adolescent barreltender has fully matured, it will possess the size and strength to vanquish foes with a single strike. For now, however, its needles are of the perfect potency for use in acupuncture to relieve ailments such as stiff shoulders and back pain.<tab>If it ain't worth a tankard o' mead, I don't give two shites! - Gerolt<tab>Hot Needles<tab>Увеличивает защиту всех союзников в радиусе действия на 10 (30 если союзник — <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>монстр<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>). <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6 с.

Summon your Ambrose the Unfinished minion. Unfinished it may be, but it is certainly not unwilling.<tab>The researchers of Origenics created this miniaturized prototype in order to ascertain the effects of excess soul use in their latest test subject. For this purpose, the souls of small animals were infused into the unit, which may explain its tendency to follow after people.<tab>I'm only here because of unfinished business. - Aldis<tab>Under Testing<tab>Наносит урон с силой 70 всем противникам в радиусе действия и снижет скорость передвижения на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your shshuye minion. One day it may become a dread tural vidraal, but it is not this day.<tab>Its name meaning “leaping sun” in the Shetona tongue, this variety of jackrabbit native to Yyasulani is held by the Shetona people to be a distant relative. In the past, a fearsome tural vidraal emerged from this otherwise harmless species and terrorized the people of Yuweyawata.<tab>Clearly, you are at a complete loss as to the identity of the virile gentle-rabbit who stands before you! - Godbert<tab>Jackrabbit Kick<tab>Наносит урон с силой 230 всем противникам в радиусе действия.

Summon your wisp of Darkness minion. What it cannot smother, it nibbles. What it cannot nibble, it tickles.<tab>In the course of recalling your ferocious battle with the Cloud of Darkness, this curious mammet somehow came to be in your possession. While its design is highly reminiscent of the works of the notorious goldsmith who crafted the wind-up succubus, there is no way to ascertain the truth of its origin.<tab>I can't begin to imagine how powerful it must have been. - Ryne<tab>Trickle of Darkness<tab>Наносит 5% урона ближайшему Камню Арканы противника.

Summon your honeysuckler minion. Doesn't have a taste for blood...yet.<tab>This juvenile creature belongs to a bloodsucking species native to Yok Tural known for preying upon livestock. Owing to their sanguine eyes, sharp fangs, protruding tongue, and spiky back, they have long been feared as demons, but they are harmless when young, feeding only on nectar until they are able to hunt.<tab>Suck the life out of my precious trees, will you!? - Gabineaux<tab>Slurp<tab>Снимает все полезные эффекты со всех противников в радиусе действия.

Summon your wind-up Erenville minion. Happy to follow rather than guide you for a change.<tab>A complementary companion to an illustrated encyclopedia, this automaton was commissioned by the Studium's publications department as part of a recruitment campaign for gleaners. Though designed in the likeness of Erenville, the man himself was not consulted on its creation on account of being afield at the time.<tab>Don't try to fool an expert. - Erenville<tab>Gleaner's Wisdom<tab>Увеличивает атаку всех союзников в радиусе действия на 10. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your toco toquito minion. A tropical bird that is all beak and has a squawk to match.<tab>Inhabiting the tropical forests of Tural, the toco toquito is most notable for its prodigious beak, which is deceptively light on account of being hollow. Further identifiable by its blue-ringed eyes and the reddish emblazoning upon its hind, it is also fondly referred to as the jewel of the forest.<tab>Why, this is it! The very jewel I spoke of! - Sula<tab>Jewel of the Forest<tab>Сокращает время повторного призыва миньонов на 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your Nano Lord minion. The land probably won't tremble before his might.<tab>A diminutive manifestation of the Shadow Lord, which arose from the core of his memories in the wake of battle. While the original Shadow Lord was a dreaded existence in the world of Vana'diel, where he led the Beastman Confederate in a war of conquest against the Enlightened Races, this entity thankfully appears to pose no danger.<tab>Minions of the Shadow Lord!? - Iroha<tab>Nano Slash<tab>Увеличивает защиту группы на 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 с.

Summon your Adamant Weapon minion. A diamond by any other name would shine as bright─at least when scale is accounted for.<tab>Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for counter G-Warrior testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.<tab>'Twould require a heart as hard as diamond to raise one's voice in anger to beings possessed of such profound...saccharinity. - Urianger<tab>Adamant Salvo<tab>Наносит 8% урона ближайшему Камню Арканы противника.

Summon your spinettesaurus minion. Small though it may be, never let it be said that it has no spine.<tab>The young of a prehistoric reptile, this creature possesses protruding spines that are likened to a sail, which it uses to regulate body temperature and perform courtship displays. In contrast to its stunted forelimbs, it is blessed with powerful legs that allow it to move quickly and snatch up prey in its elongated jaws.<tab>So long, spiny whatever-you-are. - Languid Lominsan<tab>Prehistoric Ruler<tab>Делает всех союзников в радиусе действия неуязвимыми к атакам <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>монстров<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5 с.

Summon your wind-up Pelupelu minion. The perfect souvenir, if it does say so itself.<tab>A series of this automaton was crafted by a potsworn goldsmith to serve as a promotional souvenir for the Pelupelu-run Turali Travel Agency. While the use of Kozama'uka lumber lends it a homespun appearance, it moves in a highly life-like manner thanks to the advanced mechanisms within.<tab>The Pelupelu value the act of spreading joy through trade. - Erenville<tab>Coin Counting<tab>Наносит 10% урона ближайшему Камню Арканы противника.

Summon your tin soldier S3 minion. The toy with a body of tin and a heart of gold.<tab>Boasting remarkably expressive movements despite its old-fashioned design, this tin soldier was brought to Limsa Lominsa on a vessel that plies the trade route west. According to the merchant who acquired it, such pieces were made in the likeness of a soldier of a bygone and faraway kingdom.<tab>I shall have to examine one of these mechanical soldiers later. - Y'shtola<tab>Peace in the Realm<tab>Переносит группу к центральным Вратам призыва.

Summon your wind-up Themis minion. A minion as loyal as your star is bright─a minion not bound by the confines of this world, or any other.<tab>Designed in the likeness of Themis, two of these mammets were produced at Professor Claudien's behest, with one being delivered by your own hands to Erichthonios. Cutting-edge Sharlayan techniques were employed in its fabrication, that it might not look amiss in the world of the ancients.<tab>Were my eyes mistaken? Was that Themis? - Erichthonios<tab>Conciliation<tab>Накладывает слабость к <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>марионеткам<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> на всех противников в радиусе действия. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15 с.
